text: The 2022 Changsha building collapse happened on 29 April 2022 in Wangcheng District, Changsha, Hunan, China. The accident killed 54 people. ==References== Category:2022 disasters in Asia Category:2022 in China Category:April 2022 events Category:2020s disasters in China Category:Changsha
title: 2022 Changsha building collapse
